text: Tracey Mann (born December 17, 1976) is an American businessman and politician. He is a member of the United States House of Representatives for Kansas's 1st congressional district since 2021. Mann was the 50th Lieutenant Governor of Kansas from 2018 to 2019. He was appointed by Governor Jeff Colyer in February 2018. In August 2020, he won the Republican nomination for the United States House of Representatives for Kansas's 1st congressional district.Tracey Mann wins GOP primary to replace Rep. Roger Marshall He won the general election in November 2020. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Kansas Category:United States representatives from Kansas Category:Lieutenant Governors of Kansas Category:Kansas Republicans Category:Kansas State University alumni
title: Tracey Mann
